name: Before waking...
description:
Before waking is a difficult 2d roguelike set in an abstract dream world.

You are about to wake up when an unknown entity invades your mind's dreamscape creating nightmares all around you. Fend off these creatures in a battle in your mind where every playthrough is different due to the different abilities given to you each round.

Dash into and dodge the nightmares and survive for 10 rounds to win, and for an extra challenge try to get a higher score each playthrough.

Made for Mini-Jam 105 - Dreamy. - Late Submission

All art and code was made by me. 

There is no sound or music because I ran out of time.
